Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-53263 affecting package git-lfs for versions less than 3.5.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-53263 affecting package git-lfs for versions less than 3.5.1-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package git-lfs is earlier than 3.5.1-4, affected by CVE-2024-53263
